title.question: How do I write a product review?

rows.content:
There are two ways to apply for a rebate payment.

 

1) In the product details screen of the products under the event 
  ①[reserve fund Banner]Click → ② Click on [Apply reserve fund] button 

 
{e.g.) Mobile product details  :
 

 

 

2) [PC] Events/Coupons > reserve fund

    [Mobile] Event > reserve fund > in progress screen button after selecting the corresponding event

title.question: How do I use the mobile remote control service?

rows.content:
It depends on the smartphone model and OS.

 

   [Android]

    ① Samsung Smart Phone : Search for [Mobile Support] in the Play Store

       ▶ [Mobile Support (Samsung) - Remote Call]  App Installation  


    ② Other smartphones : Search for [Mobile Support] in the Play Store

       ▶ [Mobile Support - Remote Call]  App Installation


  

    [iOS]

    ① Search for Mobile Support in the App Store  

       ▶[Mobile Support - Remote Call]  App Installation

         ※ Airplay mirroring function needs to be turned on.
